Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing with major delays at Western due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing with major delays at Western due to fire department activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Shuttle buses are available between Belmont and Kimball to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
